meta.name: Extract Information from a Logo Sheet using forms, AI, Google Sheet and Airtable

name: AI Logo Sheet Extractor to Airtable

values.fieldLabel: Addional Prompt (e.g.: What the meaning of the graphic?) *optional but helps from time to time.
values.placeholder: It's a graph chart comparing AI Tools

parameters.formDescription: Provide a Image with multiple Logos comparing or bringing multiple Tools into Context with one another.

options.systemMessage:
Your task is to retrieve Information from the given Input. Extract Categories and Attributes of all given and shown Tools, Softwares or Products you've got by the user.

Provide the Output Array of Tools with the following Structure as JSON:

[{
"name": "Name of the Tool, Software, etc.",
"attributes": ["Some category or attribute", "something else you can see from the context or image"],
"similar": ["similar tool, product, etc. from shown context", "another similar software, product, tool from context"]
},{
"name": "Name of anotherTool, Software, etc.",
"attributes": ["Some category, subcategory or general attribute", "something else you can see from the context or image"],
"similar": ["similar tool, product, etc. from shown context", "another similar software, product, tool from context"]
}]

List these structure for all the Products you see!

Here a description of the JSON fields:
"name": Just the Name of the Software.
"attribute": Turn any information from the context or image into multiple useful Attributes for this tool. Could be a category, could be a feature, etc. Try to split this information in multiple specific Attributes or Categories.
"similar": if multiple tools are shown that could compare to this one (like on the same level or in the same category), list those here

Take a deep breath and think step by step.
Try to extract every mentioned tool. There are for sure multiple listed.

nodes.name: Change each Attribute to the corresponding RecID

parameters.content: ## Attribute Creation and Mapping those created or existing Ids
## Eat the provided Images, Extract the Information out of them as "Tool -> Attributes" list.

nodes.name: Change each Smiliar to the corresponding RecID

parameters.content:
## Instructions

This automation enables you to just upload any Image (via Form) of a Logo Sheet, containing multiple Images of Products, most likely and bringing them in some context to one another. 

After submitting an AI-Agent eats **that Logo Sheet**, turning it into an List of "Productname" and "Attributes", also checks if Tools are kind of similar to another, given the Context of the Image.

We utilize AI Vision capabilities for that. **NOTE:** It might not be able to extract all informations. For a "upload and forget it" Workflow it works for me. You can even run it multiple times, to be sure. 

But if you need to make sure it extracts **everything** you might need to think about an Multi-Agent Setup with Validation-Agent Steps.

Once the Agent finishes the extraction, it will traditionally and deterministicly add those Attributes to Airtable (**Creates** those, if not already existing.) and also **Upserts** the Tool Informations.

It uses MD5 **Hashes** for turning Product Names into.. something fancy really, you could also use it without that, but I wanted to have something that looks atleast like an ID.  

### Setup

1. Set Up the Airtable like shown below.
2. Update and set Credentials for all Airtable Nodes.
3. Check or Adjust the Prompt of the Agent matching your use-case.
4. Activate the Workflow. 
5. Open the Form (default: https://your-n8n.io/form/logo-sheet-feeder)
6. Enjoy growing your Airtable.

![Image](https://cloud.let-the-work-flow.com/logo-64.png)  
Enjoy the workflow! ‚ù§Ô∏è  
[let the workf low](https://let-the-work-flow.com) ‚Äî Workflow Automation & Development

### Tools Table Fields

**Required:**
Name (singleLineText) 
Attributes (multipleRecordLinks=Link to Attributes Table) 
Hash (singleLineText) 
Similar (multipleRecordLinks=Link to the Same Table:"Tools") 

_Description (multilineText)_ 
_Website (url)_
_Category (multipleSelects)_
## Helper for Documentation (ignore or enjoy it)

### Attributes Table Fields

**Required:**
Name (singleLineText)
Tools (multipleRecordLinks=Link to Tools Table)
### Might want to Adjust Prompt to your "Use-Case" ü§ñ

## Example Logo Sheet
### For these kind of sheets the Prompt is designed per default

![Image](https://cloud.let-the-work-flow.com/workflow-data/example-ai-logo-sheet.jpg)
